properties.name: color
properties.description: Gets or sets the table border color, as a hex value or name.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Gets or sets the type of the table border.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Gets or sets the width, in points, of the table border. Not applicable to table border types that have fixed widths.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
